Head.title: BITMOE - Bitmoe Infomation Technology
Head.description: BITMOE is a new generation technology company dedicated to the research and development of information technology, mainly engaged in e-commerce technology research and development, computer system maintenance, computer/mobile device software development, etc.
Head.keywords: Biteme, Intellectual Property, Information Technology, Mini Program, Website

Footer.description: Bitmoe information team started to build in late 2015, and the “bit“ in the company name “Bitmoe“ is taken from the basic computer unit of measurement “bit“, which means Information“ technology, and the word “Moe“ (meaning “sprout“) in the “Rites of the Month“, which means “the one who makes a sentence will come out, and the one who sprouts will be reached“, is combined to form a new phrase; it reflects our confidence and vision for the future development of information technology. It reflects our confidence and vision for the future development of information technology. Our company adheres to the information / credit, access to the future. The company's business philosophy is to help all market players strengthen their information functions and win the information war in the future...

Timeline.1-title: Bitmoe Information Participates in the SAR Blockchain Electronic Invoice Pilot
Timeline.1-description: Keeping pace with the times, Bitmeng Information participates in the blockchain electronic invoicing pilot in Shenzhen Special Economic Zone.
Timeline.2-title: Bitmoe Information's total tax payments for 2017 increased 20 times over the previous year Plan completed
Timeline.2-description: In May 2018, the Company completed the 2017 annual remittance and completed the budget of 20 times increase in total tax payment for the year compared to the previous year.
Timeline.3-title: The business connection between Bitmoe Information Company and government departments is completed
Timeline.3-description: In April 2016, the Company completed the opening of accounts with banks and the actual payment of the Company's registered capital.
Timeline.4-title: Bitmoe Information Company was officially incorporated
Timeline.4-description: At the beginning of 2016, in response to Premier Li's slogan “Mass Entrepreneurship, Mass Innovation“, Bitmoe team decided to convert the team into a limited company to better assist IT services.
Timeline.5-description: At the end of 2015, eight HEXO enthusiasts from all over the country committed themselves to the promotion of information technology with the concept of ”Shinta Future“.

Contact.Address-slug: A603, Building G, E-commerce Innovation Service Base, Nanshan, Shenzhen, Guangdong, China

Products.Valine-slug: A fast, simple and efficient backend-less commenting system.
Products.Valine-description: Born on August 7, 2017, Valine is a fast, clean and efficient backend-less commenting system based on LeanCloud. Theoretically supporting but not limited to static blogs, Valine is already being used by blogs and documentation programs such as Hexo, Jekyll, Typecho, Hugo, Ghost, Docsify, and more.
Products.PortableHexo-description: Simple, easy to use, all in one fell swoop, for you to focus on writing blogs
Products.ASPICE-slug: Automated evaluation system for automotive mechanical development process
Products.ASPICE-description: Automated evaluation system for automotive mechanical development process
Products.ONEDATA-slug: Unified financial access to data systems
Products.ONEDATA-description: Unified financial access to data systems
